item.description:
# Account Login 1

> **This Route is for account login and profile access. There are different check up and scenarios. The following test are being done here:**

*   **Successful Login of account**
*   **Proper view of Account Profile**
    *   View Profile with Invalid Token
    *   View Profile with Empty Token
*   **Update Account Profile**
    *   Trying to update profile with empty FirstName
    *   Trying to update profile with empty LastName
    *   Trying to update profile with empty Date of Birth
    *   Trying to update profile with empty Gender
    *   Trying to update profile with empty Token
    *   Trying to update profile with invalid Token
